bibl.title: Sappho in the Making. The Early Reception. (Hellenic Studies. 28.)
bibl.note: Translates and discusses several Sappho papyri. - 1. An Anthropology of Reception. - 2. Ethnographic Archives of Vraisemblance in Attic Ceramics. - 3. The Anthropology of Ancient Reception: The Late Archaic and Classical Periods. - 4. Traditions in Flux. - 5. In Search of Sappho's Companions: Anthropological Fieldwork on Socioaesthetic Cultures. - Bibliography. Indices.
YATROMANOLAKIS Dimitrios, Sappho in the Making. The Early Reception. (Hellenic Studies. 28.)
Washington, DC, Center for Hellenic Studies (Diffusion: Harvard University Press), 2007, 8Â°, xxi-442 pp., 35 figg. ISBN 978-0-674-02686-5. $19.95.
